org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system

Class CloseableOnFinalize<ParentType extends RefCounted>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system.Closeable
      • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system.CloseableOnFinalize<ParentType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Finalizable

    public abstract class CloseableOnFinalize<ParentType extends RefCounted>
extends Closeable
implements Finalizable
    CloseableOnFinalize instances will be (internally) closed on finalization, if they haven't already been closed beforehand. In this way, underlying resources can be guaranteed to be reclaimed.
